title: How to Make a Rabbit Puppet out of Gloves

steps.headline: Using a pencil, trace 2 small, skinny ovals onto the pink felt.
steps.description: Use your pinky and index fingers for a guide. Make one oval the length of each finger and as wide as its nail. Cut them out and set aside.

steps.headline: Draw a small triangle on the felt and cut it out.
Put the glove on your other hand, the one you don't write with.
steps.description: Bend down your middle finger and ring finger.

steps.headline: Take the glue and squeeze it onto the back of the ovals.
steps.description: Glue it onto its respective finger. Press firmly.

steps.headline: Glue the triangle, point down, onto the middle finger's second knuckle almost touching the ring finger.
Glue the two googly eyes above each first knuckle on the ring and middle fingers.
Take a pom-pom ball and glue it onto the middle of the back of your hand.
Take off the glove and let dry.
You now have a glove rabbit puppet!

text: Using a pencil, trace 2 small, skinny ovals onto the pink felt. Use your pinky and index fingers for a guide. Make one oval the length of each finger and as wide as its nail. Cut them out and set aside. Draw a small triangle on the felt and cut it out. Set aside. Put the glove on your other hand, the one you don't write with. Bend down your middle finger and ring finger. Take the glue and squeeze it onto the back of the ovals. Glue it onto its respective finger. Press firmly. Glue the triangle, point down, onto the middle finger's second knuckle almost touching the ring finger.  Glue the two googly eyes above each first knuckle on the ring and middle fingers.  Take a pom-pom ball and glue it onto the middle of the back of your hand.  Take off the glove and let dry.  You now have a glove rabbit puppet!
